thread.section_title: FolderPrinters.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FolderPrinters.com | folderprinters.com
thread.title: Scott McClannahan, CEO, Pure Technology Inc.
thread.title_full: FolderPrinters.com reviewed by Scott McClannahan, CEO, Pure Technology Inc.

author: Scott McClannahan, CEO, Pure Technology Inc.
title: Scott McClannahan, CEO, Pure Technology Inc.
text: At first, we weren't 100% sure about going with an online company such as FolderPrinters due to the fact that it would be more difficult to send/receive printed proofs (vs just digital). After working with Folder Printers and putting our faith in their "online" system, we received our products sooner than anticipated and we were very pleased with the quality. We will definitely use FolderPrinters.com again in the future!
